summary: The Forgotten Keep is a player home located outside of whiterun,the former home of a master conjurer who spent his last days working on combining conjuration magic and dwarven automatons.But,to this day,no one is quite sure what happened to him.What is known,how ever,is that his keep,and his research are up for grabs..
descriptionHtml:
The Forgotten Keep is a player home located outside of whiterun,the former home of a master conjurer who spent his last days working on combining conjuration magic and dwarven automatons.But,to this day,no one is quite sure what happened to him.What is known,how ever,is that his keep,and his research are up for grabs,will you be the adventurer that claims the forgotten keep and finds thie lost Dwemer magic? 

Features -
9 player owned chests,19 mannequins,13 display cases,6 weapon racks,9 weapon plaques,9 working shrines with different effects,12 bookcases,a bed,cooking pot/spit,a rich merchant with a good variety of stock,a forge,alchemy and enchanting benches and its own herb and poison gardens that grows back after time.
Their are 3 new conjuration spells to be found in the keep in a (not very ;)) hidden location.
latest update includes 4 practice chests to train your lock picking skill.
A dragon priest mask altar.
A poison garden.
An underground pool/bath/shower.
A complete new forge.

Check it out on the steam workshop to read some reviews - http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=127449936
Currently over 1000 subscribers :)
author: iboomstickv2
